forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 61F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds with mostly sunny skies by afternoon. High near 15C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming mostly sunny by afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 61F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 58F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
